description: Tofu cubes are soaked in a savory ginger-sesame marinade and baked until crisp, then served over a bed of rice and veggies topped with wasabi seasoned tahini dressing in these delicious and healthy vegan sushi bowls.
name: Baked Tofu Sushi Bowls with Wasabi Tahini Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 lb. extra firm tofu, (drained, pressed for at least 30 minutes and cut into 1 inch cubes)
2 cups cooked rice. (sushi rice works great, but I just used short grain brown rice)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir soy sauce or tamari, rice vinegar, agave, sesame oil and ginger together in small bowl. Add tofu and toss to coat. Allow to marinate for at least 30 minutes, tossing every so often to recoat.
Preheat oven to 400o and line a baking sheet with parchment. Arrange tofu cubes in a single layer on baking sheet. Bake until lightly browned, about 30 minutes, flipping halfway through.
